mapper.select: select member_id as memberId, code, prd_no as prdNo, prd_name as prdName, prd_filepath as prdFilepath from scrapbook where member_id=#{memberId} and code=#{code} and prd_no=#{objectNo}
mapper.delete: delete from scrapbook where prd_no=#{objectNo} and code=#{code} and member_id=#{memberId}
